entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
